title: Licensure required
context: [ยง448B-4] Licensure required. No person shall purport to be a &ldquo;licensed dietitian&rdquo; or use the letters &ldquo;L.D.&rdquo; in connection with the person&rsquo;s name, or use any words or symbols indicating or tending to indicate that the person is a licensed dietitian without meeting the applicable requirements and holding a license as set forth in this chapter. [L 2000, c 280, pt of ยง2]
